posts.title: About Magic seven
posts.written: Magic Seven, s.r.o. is located in Praha 7 - Holešovice, Czech Republic and is part of the Advertising, Public Relations, and Related Services Industry. Magic Seven, s.r.o. has 3 employees at this location and generates $1.11 million in sales (USD). (Employees figure is estimated).

posts.title: Magic Seven's Publisher Summary
posts.written: Total Magic Seven mobile app revenue in October 2021 was $600k, including $400k for iOS apps and $100k for Android apps. Total mobile app downloads for Magic Seven was 2m, including 300k iOS app downloads and 1m Android app downloads. Magic Seven has a total of 18 apps, including 10 iOS apps, and 8 Android apps. Their top grossing app last month was Cooking City and their most downloaded app was Cooking City.

posts.title: the must succeeded games published by Magic seven
posts.written:
Cooking City - one of the most addictive time management cooking games! Join in the Cooking City, tap as fast as you can to enjoy the fast-paced gameplay!

Prepare, cook, and serve tasty meals from all over the world! Dash from classic coffee to Chinese restaurant; open a Bakery to bake sweet cakes and desserts; run a Burger Shop to grill yummy burgers and hot dogs; and so much fun... Experience pizza craze, cake mania and cook fever in dozens of cooking cities! Challenge cooking in the kitchen and restaurant and lead a cooking empire!

Open Restaurants Anytime, Anywhere
- No Internet needed after the initial install!
- Enjoy time-management game play in your pocket anytime!
- Cook offline fun, open your kitchen anywhere you like!
- Build your cooking empire in this Free Food Game!

Cook Over 300 Tasty Foods
- Paris, Rome, Sydney, Moscow, Chiang Mai, Munich, Beijing, Kyoto, New Dehli...
- Dozens of cities to travel and unlock!
- Hundreds of delicious ingredients and recipes to cook for meals.
- Burgers, waffles, chips, sushi and pizza...Cook dishes you've seen or never seen before.
- Upgrade ingredients to manage top cooking restaurants!
- Master all kinds of dishes and menus. Hungry diners grow with each city!

2000+ Levels with Unique Goals
- Fantasy strategy meets fast-paced game!
- Time-management meets fun challenge cooking limits!
- Interesting mini games and various weekly events to kill time!
- Complete big monthly events to win free rewards! Gems, coins and boosts and energy!
- Celebrate important festivals in time-limited theme restaurants!
- Cook up rewarding combos, earning big bonuses!
- Endless fun with new levels and casual games!
- Unlock more cities which are constantly updated!

posts.title: Inactive games published by Magic seven
posts.written:
1. Zombie Survival - Gun Shooting

A huge thick fog swept the entire city and the city was completely lost. No one knows exactly what happened in the city. A week later, the rescue team came to the city, but it was a real nightmare waiting for them...
When the helicopters used by the rescue team landed at the city airport, the dense fog quickly shrouded. The rescue team has been unable to return. It can only be explored in dense fog and find out the truth about dense fog!
Flooding with all kinds of monsters in thick fog, the team needs to fight against these monsters while searching for supplies to rescue the survivors of the city!
From the airport to the old city to the downtown area, the rescue team has also followed and gradually opened the veil!

* Cool shooting effect!
* 4 different theme levels!
* Rich item system!
* More than 50 different monsters!
* Multiple bosses for players to challenge!

Enjoy the monster feast!

2. Snake Candy.IO

Do you love eating candies?

You will play against other snakes online! Move strategically and glide in front of other snakes to defeat them. Try to get other snakes to bump into you so that you can eat their candy remains to strengthen yourself! Avoid your head touching other snakes, or you will get blast and incarnated into candies as well, then have to start over.

Are you ready to be the biggest snake?

Snake Candy.IO is completely free to play but some in-game items such as skin or diamonds will require payment.

posts.title: Tips:
posts.written:
- Using your body to hit toward the head of others snakes
- Slither and eat as many candies as you can to grow larger
- Try to stay alive as long as possible
- Tap the lightening button to speed up
- Avoid the map margins or you will explode and turn out to be candies
